A patch release of iRINGTools 2.1 that includes bug fixes.  

The download is available [http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools-Core-2.1.1.zip here].  
/iRINGTools-Adapter-2.1.1.zip here]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_Installation_Guide_v2.0.1.pdf Installation Guide]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_Users_Guide_v2.0.3.pdf Users Guide]

[http://iring-tools.googlecode.com/files/iRINGTools_SDK_Guide_v2.0.2.pdf SDK Guide]

== Bugs Fixed ==
 * Adapter Manager: 
    + Property maps not retained when switching related objects in configuring object relationship
    + Duplicate relationships to the same related object
    + Incorrect data type being saved upon saving data objects
    
== Enhancements ==
  * Encrypt connection string in database dictionary and hibernate configuration file
  * Store value-map label in mapping file to improve DTO loading on  Exchange Manager
